    • Uses of MessageClass in com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.messages

      Methods in com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.messages that return MessageClass 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageClass Message.getMessageClass() 
      Constructors in com.nexmo.messaging.sdk.messages with parameters of type MessageClass 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryMessage(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to, byte[] binaryMessageBody, byte[] binaryMessageUdh, java.lang.String clientReference, boolean statusReportRequired, MessageClass messageClass, java.lang.Integer protocolId)
      Instanciate a new binary sms message request, attaching an optional client reference, message-class or TTL, and optionally requesting a delivery notification.
      Message(int type, java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to, java.lang.String messageBody, byte[] binaryMessageBody, byte[] binaryMessageUdh, java.lang.String clientReference, boolean unicode, boolean statusReportRequired, java.lang.String wapPushUrl, java.lang.String wapPushTitle, int wapPushValidity, MessageClass messageClass, java.lang.Integer protocolId)
      Instanciate a new message request.
      This constructor exposes the full range of possible parameters and is not for general use Instead, it is accessed via super() in the constructors of various sub-classes that expose a relevant sub-set of the available parameters
      TextMessage(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to, java.lang.String messageBody, java.lang.String clientReference, boolean statusReportRequired, MessageClass messageClass, java.lang.Integer protocolId)
      Instanciate a new text-message request, exposing all of the available parameters, and optionally requesting a delivery notification.
      This message will be submitted as a regular 8 bit text message
      UnicodeMessage(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to, java.lang.String messageBody, java.lang.String clientReference, boolean statusReportRequired, MessageClass messageClass, java.lang.Integer protocolId)
      Instanciate a new unicode text-message request, exposing all of the available parameters, and optionally requesting a delivery notification
      This message will be submitted as a unicode 16 bit text message
